experience.title: Software Engineer - Backend
experience.description:
One of the largest mobile operators and the largest internet service provider in Thailand. Developed and maintained RESTful webservices for True's campaign creating web application using Golang. Design of a service to handle a sizeable amount of expired mobile campaigns on a daily basis. Redesigning a system architecture to create independent services in the form of 
microservices to handle changes and failures efficiently.

experience.title: OpenCV Programmer
experience.description: A tech startup providing services to government and private enterprises including TRUE and AIS. Designing an application using OpenCV and Python to capture ID cards and classify the type of ID card of the user using machine learning models. Design people and vehicle counting applications to help assess futuredevelopment in those areas. Implement a document scanning feature on an android mobile application.

experience.title: Machine Learning and DevOps Engineer
experience.description: A pioneer of technology and also the European expert in open source solutions. Designing a streaming architecture using Kafka and Python.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer - UI design
experience.description: Largest mobile phone operator in Thailand. Develop and maintain web application integrated with a sim card dispensing machine using angular framework for sim preparation. Create RESTful web services for the sim card dispensing web application to access and update AIS information using Nodejs and mongoD.

information.name: Mufaddal Enayath Hussain
information.summary: With over three years of experience in the software industry, I have worked with multicultural teams and developed a deep interest in the field of software engineering. Currently, I am pursuing a dual degree for a Master's in Data Science and Network Intelligence, and Computer Science

project.name: Planar ping pong ball bouncing robot
project.description:
Designed a ping pong ball bouncing robot that can continuously bounce a ball on a single plane by detecting the balls position in real time using OpenCV
and C++ and relaying it's coordinates to Arduino board to control the y-axis of
the bat as well as it's rotation using motors. This project required the use of
3D printing custom parts which were designed in SolidWorks to allow motion
of the bat in the y axis.

project.name: AIT Student Union website
project.description:
Designing a dynamic webpage for the AIT student union using Ruby on rails
framework and Postgres database to be used to keep the students of AIT
informed about events and allowing them to contact the union regarding any
issues.
Implementing continuous Integration and continuous deployment pipeline
using gitlab CI/CD for testing and seamless and safe deployment.
